page.title: 07Tourism in Epworth.
page.content: Tourists coming to Epworth mainly visit{The Old Rectory,John Wesley's {Grave,The Wesley Chapel,}and the steps of the{Market Cross}from where John Wesley supposedly preached. They come from all over England, notably the South West, and from all over the world, especially from {America . Tourists arrive in Epworth throughout the year though Summer, when The Rectory Gardens are at their best, is the main season.Usually they come on day trips but a few stay over. {The Red Lion Hotel}and{The Hillcrest {Hotel}accomodate the majority of these visitors.
